response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Considering its value and the impact it can have on your operations, I propose a special introductory price of $14,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations and if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 14500}
